name: Super Punchy Face (itch)
description:
Super Punchy Face is a fast-paced evolution of classic beat-em-ups, with full 360 degree combat and Jackie Chan style improvisation and packed with emergent slapstick gameplay.

This is a game where you can slide down a bar counter,  grab a bottle and smash it over a guys head, then grab a mop bucket and hurl it at the bouncer before he hits you with a pool cue.

Only runs on PC right now.

This is only a prototype and it's not polished. Thanks for playing!! <<<333

Last update: 10/18/2017

- New enemy type: Tough Guy, doesn't get staggered by attacks.

- Smoother camera for gamepads. 

- Doors! They are early and need work but here they are. Kick them.

- Fixed some miscellaneous glitches. Discovered a few more, left them in because they're pretty cool.
